text: Ezɨ gumazir dapanir igharazir mam, Adaia. Adaia, a Jerohamɨn otarim, ezɨ Jeroham, a Pasurɨn otarim, ezɨ Pasur, a Malkian otarim. Ezɨ ua gumazir dapanir igharazir mam, Masai. Masai, a Adielɨn otarim, ezɨ Adiel, a Jaseran otarim, ezɨ Jasera, a Mesulamɨn otarim, ezɨ Mesulam, a Mesilemitɨn otarim, ezɨ Mesilemit, a Imerɨn otarim.
